pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This library implements a backend for the Accelerate language instrumented for parallel execution on CUDA-capable NVIDIA GPUs.
To use this backend you need CUDA version 3.x or later installed. Note that currently there is no support for 'Char' and 'Bool' arrays (this is a limitation of the front-end language).

use.flag: Enable bounds checking in unsafe operations.
